name: Awesomekit
tag_list: army-surplus-clothing, camouflage-clothing, waterproof-clothing, military-uniforms, government-clothing, boots, socks, hats, gloves, goretex-clothing, survival-clothing, cammo-nets, accessories, hunting-knifes, workwear, work-wear, badges, militeria-and-c
overview:
We offer access to a massive range of operational brands and a high range of high quality military and outdoor clothing and equipment targeted at both civilian, security, police and military use.

When it comes to a military ranged group we include products designed for all arms of the services whether they be British Army, Royal Navy, Royal Marines Commandos or Royal Air Force, and that also includes the Reserve Components and the Cadet forces as well! With us you can find a wide and ever expanding range of clothing and equipment that’s affordable and specialist in their design with well respected brand names included that are also responsible for contracts with Special Forces branches of the MOD as well as the Police.
